title: BRIEF-Regional Health Properties - Co ‍Entered Separate Mediation Settlement Agreement With Respect To Professional And General Liability Actions​
text: March 16, 2018 / 9:15 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Regional Health Properties - Co ‍Entered Separate Mediation Settlement Agreement With Respect To Professional And General Liability Actions​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Regional Health Properties Inc: * REGIONAL HEALTH PROPERTIES - CO ‍ENTERED SEPARATE MEDIATION SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WITH RESPECT TO PROFESSIONAL AND GENERAL LIABILITY ACTIONS​ * REGIONAL HEALTH PROPERTIES - ‍ ENTERED SEPARATE MEDIATION SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT RELATING TO SETTLEMENT IN PRINCIPLE OF UNDERLYING LAWSUIT​S * REGIONAL HEALTH PROPERTIES INC - ‍ EACH MEDIATION SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR PAYMENT BY REGIONAL OF A SPECIFIED SETTLEMENT AMOUNT​ * REGIONAL- ‍UNDER AGREEMENT,CO TO BE RELEASED FROM CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF APPLICABLE PLAINTIFF'S CARE WHILE PLAINTIFF RESIDING AT ONE OF CO'S FACILITIES​ Source text ( bit.ly/2plvFhZ ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
